derivation: a primitive root (possibly rather identical with H6030 (עָנָה) through the idea of looking down or browbeating);
strongs_def: to depress literally or figuratively, transitive or intransitive (in various applications, as follows)
kjv_def: abase self, afflict(-ion, self), answer (by mistake for H6030 (עָנָה)), chasten self, deal hardly with, defile, exercise, force, gentleness, humble (self), hurt, ravish, sing (by mistake for H6030 (עָנָה)), speak (by mistake for H6030 (עָנָה)), submit self, weaken, [idiom] in any wise.
